text: Code in a test country_event which trigger in 1 day which give SIam 100 political power, trigger only once.

I have created the event file for you.

Here is the script contained in `events/Siam_test_events.txt`:

```hoi4
add_namespace = test_siam

country_event = {
    id = test_siam.1
    title = "Siam Political Boost"
    desc = "A sudden surge of political will has occurred."
    picture = GFX_report_event_generic_read_write

    fire_only_once = yes

    trigger = {
        tag = SIA
    }

    mean_time_to_happen = {
        days = 1
    }

    option = {
        name = "Excellent"
        add_political_power = 100
    }
}
```

This event will:
- Trigger for **Siam** (`tag = SIA`).
- Occur roughly **1 day** after the conditions are met (start of game if valid).
- Grant **100 Political Power**.
- Fire **only once** per game.
